tests.name: PYRE PRAETORIAN HARDENING should fail to demote if file does not exist
PYRE PRAETORIAN HARDENING should successfully demote a file to archive and log to Blood Book
PYRE PRAETORIAN HARDENING should successfully purge a file and log to Blood Book
PYRE PRAETORIAN HARDENING should demote low coverage in silver/gold but only log it in bronze
PYRE PRAETORIAN HARDENING should demote from Gold/Silver medallions correctly
PYRE PRAETORIAN HARDENING should fail to purge if file does not exist
PYRE PRAETORIAN HARDENING should demote a file if it is in Silver and has a violation
PYRE PRAETORIAN HARDENING should demote severe violations even in Bronze
PYRE PRAETORIAN HARDENING should only log non-severe Bronze violations without demoting
PYRE PRAETORIAN HARDENING should use default bronze archive for files outside hot_obsidian_sandbox
PYRE PRAETORIAN HARDENING should handle Windows paths with backslashes correctly in danceDie
PYRE PRAETORIAN HARDENING should create deep non-existent paths for archive in demote
PYRE PRAETORIAN HARDENING should skip directories in danceDie
PYRE PRAETORIAN HARDENING should hit the catch block in demote on move failure
PYRE PRAETORIAN HARDENING should skip if file moved or deleted between check and action
PYRE PRAETORIAN HARDENING should kill MEDALLIONS string mutants
PYRE PRAETORIAN HARDENING should handle Windows paths with backslashes correctly in danceDie and kill normalization mutants
PYRE PRAETORIAN HARDENING should use default bronze archive for invalid medallions in hot_obsidian_sandbox
PYRE PRAETORIAN HARDENING should recreate archive directory if it does not exist in demote
PYRE PRAETORIAN HARDENING should only process existing files in danceDie and skip others
PYRE PRAETORIAN HARDENING should kill the reason string mutant by verifying log content
PYRE PRAETORIAN HARDENING should kill the deep mkdirSync mutants by forcing recursion in demote
PYRE PRAETORIAN HARDENING should kill the recursive:false mutant in ensureDir during resurrection
PYRE PRAETORIAN HARDENING should kill Goldilocks threshold mutants in resurrection
PYRE PRAETORIAN HARDENING should kill the logToBlackboard mutant in resurrection
PYRE PRAETORIAN HARDENING should kill the getParaDest mutant by using an invalid root but valid medallion name
PYRE PRAETORIAN HARDENING should kill the mkdirSync recursive:true mutant by creating a deep non-existent path
PYRE PRAETORIAN HARDENING should kill logToBloodBook mutants by deleting the target directory first
PYRE PRAETORIAN RESURRECTION should successfully resurrect an artifact in the Goldilocks zone and log to blackboard
PYRE PRAETORIAN RESURRECTION should fail resurrection if target is missing and log error
PYRE PRAETORIAN RESURRECTION should block abyssal failure scores (< 80%) and log error
PYRE PRAETORIAN RESURRECTION should block exactly 80.0% if its <= MIN and log error
PYRE PRAETORIAN RESURRECTION should allow scores just above 80%
PYRE PRAETORIAN RESURRECTION should block AI Theater scores (> 99%) and log error
PYRE PRAETORIAN RESURRECTION should block exactly 99.0% if its >= MAX and log error
PYRE PRAETORIAN RESURRECTION should allow scores just below 99%
PYRE PRAETORIAN RESURRECTION should create deep missing dest directories during resurrection
PYRE PRAETORIAN RESURRECTION should hit the catch block on copy error and log error
P4-P5 Red/Blue Dance should detect violation (P4) and execute demotion (P5)
